title: Dad's Russian Mafia Friend
description: Your dad asked me to do what he can’t…protect you.But one look at you and I know I won’t be able to protect myself from all the bad things I want to do to you, you naughty little girl.You’re too young, too innocent, and too perfect not to claim as mine.Once I get a taste of you, and you get a taste of the fantasies filling my head that I'm saving just for you and only you…neither one of us will ever let go.You’re mine now…forever.*Dad’s Russian Mafia Friend is a “mafia lite” insta-everything standalone instalove romance with an HEA, no cheating, no ow, no dubcon, and no cliffhanger.
author: Flora Ferrari
